attributes.action: Make GJ Sports a publicly funded company
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: GJ Sports - a sports informational and interactive website - needs public funding to continue running.  In much the same way as the public are forced to pay the BBC, the public should also be forced to pay GJ Sports - whether or not they require the service.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
